unnormalised: Hey guys, thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Mumbai, eh? Let's talk home loan schemes! It can be a real jungle out there, so sharing some gyaan.
normalised: Hey guys, thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Mumbai, eh? Let's talk home loan schemes! It can be a real jungle out there, so sharing some gyaan.

unnormalised: First off, don't just blindly go to SBI. Shop around! HDFC, ICICI, even smaller players like, say, Bandhan Bank sometimes have surprisingly good deals. Check aggregator sites like Paisabazaar or Bankbazaar. They make comparing interest rates (and more importantly, the overall cost) super easy.
normalised: First off, don't just blindly go to S B I. Shop around! H D F C, I C I C I, even smaller players like, say, Bandhan Bank sometimes have surprisingly good deals. Check aggregator sites like Paisabazaar or Bankbazaar. They make comparing interest rates (and more importantly, the overall cost) super easy.

unnormalised: Look beyond just the interest rate. Processing fees, pre-payment penalties (if you think you might be able to pay off early), and other hidden charges can sting. Ask for a detailed break-up.
normalised: Look beyond just the interest rate. Processing fees, pre-payment penalties (if you think you might be able to pay off early), and other hidden charges can sting. Ask for a detailed break-up.

unnormalised: Also, remember the 'EMI Holiday' period some banks offer? Seems tempting, right? But crunch the numbers! It usually just means higher interest later. Not always worth it.
normalised: Also, remember the 'E M I Holiday' period some banks offer? Seems tempting, right? But crunch the numbers! It usually just means higher interest later. Not always worth it.

unnormalised: If you're a first-time home buyer, definitely check out the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY). You could get a subsidy, which is basically free money! Eligibility criteria apply, of course.
normalised: If you're a first-time home buyer, definitely check out the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (P M A Y). You could get a subsidy, which is basically free money! Eligibility criteria apply, of course.

unnormalised: Visited a property site today, 03/10/2024, at around 11:00 hrs and the builder suggested some tie-ups with particular banks. Always do your due diligence and compare even then!
normalised: Visited a property site today, third october two thousand and twenty four, at around eleven zero zero hours and the builder suggested some tie-ups with particular banks. Always do your due diligence and compare even then!

unnormalised: Finally, get your paperwork in order well in advance. CIBIL score, salary slips, PAN card...the whole shebang. Makes the process smoother. My friend Rohan missed out on a great deal back in 2020 because his documentation wasn't ready!
normalised: Finally, get your paperwork in order well in advance. C I B I L score, salary slips, P A N card...the whole shebang. Makes the process smoother. My friend Rohan missed out on a great deal back in two thousand and twenty because his documentation wasn't ready!

unnormalised: Good luck finding your own little Lakshman Rekha! Remember to consult a financial advisor for personalized advice at least by 15/11/2024.
normalised: Good luck finding your own little Lakshman Rekha! Remember to consult a financial advisor for personalized advice at least by fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four.
